text: Paressisus is a monotypic beetle genus in the family Cerambycidae described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1917. Its only species, Paressisus viridipennis, was described by the same author in the same year.BioLib.cz - Paressisus viridipennis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1917 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Paressisus
